circumstances:
The crew was taking part to the 'Operation Varsity'. While approaching Mehr, the aircraft was shot down by the German Flak and crashed in a field 1,6 km south of the village. All five crew members were killed. 
Crew:
Sgt Charles F. Bragdon,
Lt Col Mars Lewis,
2nd Lt Roland R. Loeffler,
1st Lt Harrison B. Walton Jr.,
S/Sgt John R. Yost.
probable_cause: Shot down by the German Flak.
